comments: Abolished 1.4.1934 and added to the parish of Llanbedr Ystradwy.
Abolished 1.4.1934 and added to the parish of Patrishow.
Abolished 1.4.1934 and added to the parish of Llanbedr Ystradwy.

In 1889 the parts of the parish of Llangattock in the urban districts 
    of Brynmawr and Ebbw Vale were transferred from Brecknockshire to Monmouthshire, 
    in 1894 these areas became the separate parishes of Llangattock Brynmawr and 
    Beaufort respectively, so that thereafter Llangattock was again wholly in Brecknockshire. 
    See also Table 2, note (d).

In 1889 the parts of the parish of Llangynidr in the urban districts 
    of Ebbw Vale, Rhymney and Tredegar, were transferred from Brecknockshire to 
    Monmouthshire, in 1894 these areas became the separate parishes of Rassa, Llechryd and Dukestown respectively, so that thereafter Llangynidr was again wholly in 
    Brecknockshire. See also Table 2, note (d).
